game.name: Train Simulator: Santa Fe Super Fleet GP60M
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: From accomplished developer Reppo, the remarkable EMD GP60M – and its cabless sister, the GP60B – comes to Train Simulator Classic!
